mapper.select: select no, id, title, content, gNo, step, indent, count, date_format(bDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as bDate from board_adv
select no, id, title, content, gNo, step, indent, count, date_format(bDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as bDate from board_adv where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board_adv (no, id, title, content, gNo, step, indent, count, bDate) values ((select * from (select max(no)+1 from board_adv) next), #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, (select * from (select max(gNo)+1 from board_adv) next), 0, 0, 0, now())
mapper.update: update from board_adv set step = step+1 where gNo=#{gNo} AND step > #{step}
mapper.insert: insert into board_adv (no, id, title, content, gNo, step, indent, count, bDate) values ((select * from (select max(no)+1 from board_adv) next), #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gNo}, #{step}+1, #{indent}+1, 0, now())
